projector



class Projector;
A class that interfaces with the lightcrafter

this(Address address = new InternetAddress("192.168.1.100", 21845));
Create a new Projector

address = the address of the lightcrafter, defaults to 192.168.1.100 (the hardcoded default)

void start();
tell the lightcrafter to start the pattern sequence

void stop();
tell the lightcrafter to stop the pattern sequence

void setDisplayMode(DisplayMode mode);
Set the projector to a specific display mode

Params:
DisplayMode mode the display mode, options are STATIC_IMAGE, STATIC_COLOR, HDMI_VIDEO, or PATTERN_SEQUENCE

void loadImages(string directory);
Load a directory of 96 images into the buffer

The directory should contain 96 .bmp files

note:
the display mode has to be reset after images are loaded into the buffer, do this by calling start()

Params:
string directory the location of a directory

void setSolidColor(ubyte r, ubyte g, ubyte b);
tell this projector to display a solid color

Params:
ubyte r red component
ubyte g green component
ubyte b blue component
